result.markdown: --- title: "ggplot testing" author: "Victor Bl√¶r" date: "2025-01-22" categories: [news, code, analysis, test2] image: "image.jpg" theme: "darkly" --- # Testing different embed options - Iframe (static not recommended vs embed (recommended). - Also, need to update OS for newest R studio. Running into issues with advanced stuff in the YAML..currently working on Jan 22nd 2025 This is a post with executable code. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 1 + 1 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 2 ``` ::: ::: Option 1 - "Works" but preview looks different than render. Also doesn't scale, cuts off the title and a little off ::: {.flourish-embed .flourish-chart data-src="visualisation/21098727"} ```{=html} ``` ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Option 2 - Using embed other iframe - Works well ish..need to tweek. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ::: {style="width:100%!;margin-top:4px!important;text-align:right!important;"} ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Option 3 - Using recommended and chart2 - conclusion - works really well ! wooohoo, now test v2 ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ::: {.flourish-embed .flourish-chart data-src="visualisation/21258895"} ```{=html} ``` ::: ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ### Option 4 - Using iframe, apparently isn't responsive - conclusion - actually works better and is responsive. > tested by changing browser window size and it worked. Worked even better than option 3 bc the chart title labels didn't smush the chart down. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ::: {style="width:100%!;margin-top:4px!important;text-align:right!important;"} ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(ggplot2) ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: - - It's also my first quarto blog github something post test. - another bullet ::: callout-note this is a callout test ::: #### my small heading üòä this is really cool > this is a blockqoute ### another small heading test ## heading type 2 ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} 22*2 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 44 ``` ::: ::: ``` r code block optional ``` inserrtt eexec cll ::: {.cell} :::
